name: Bromodosis Mansion
description:
You are being chased inside a neverending hallway of a mansion by a pair of giant... feet. Run away and stay alive as long as possible.

You can collect blood drops in order to increase your score. Also, be sure to hit some of the boost pads to run faster. 

And be careful not to touch anything else, or it will slow you down.

Press A/D to roll to the left/right.
